user_message:
<target code>Here is the code that failed to compile:
```c
static void os_binsem_log(const char *fmt, ...)
{
    FILE *fp = fopen("/tmp/logs/1203.txt", "a");
    if (fp == NULL)
    {
        return;
    }

    /* timestamp */
    time_t t = time(NULL);
    struct tm tm_buf;
#if defined(_MSC_VER)
    /* MSVC uses localtime_s */
    localtime_s(&tm_buf, &t);
#else
    localtime_r(&t, &tm_buf);
#endif
    char timebuf[64];
    strftime(timebuf, sizeof(timebuf), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", &tm_buf);

    fprintf(fp, "%s - ", timebuf);

    va_list ap;
    va_start(ap, fmt);
    vfprintf(fp, fmt, ap);
    va_end(ap);

    fprintf(fp, "\n");
    fclose(fp);
}

int32 OS_BinSemGetInfo(osal_id_t sem_id, OS_bin_sem_prop_t *bin_prop)
{
    OS_common_record_t *record;
    OS_object_token_t   token;
    int32               return_code;

    /* Log entry and parameters */
    os_binsem_log("ENTER OS_BinSemGetInfo: sem_id=%" PRIuPTR " bin_prop=%" PRIuPTR,
                  (uintptr_t)sem_id, (uintptr_t)bin_prop);

    /* Check parameters */
    OS_CHECK_POINTER(bin_prop);

    memset(bin_prop, 0, sizeof(OS_bin_sem_prop_t));

    os_binsem_log("After memset bin_prop=%" PRIuPTR ", size=%zu",
                  (uintptr_t)bin_prop, sizeof(OS_bin_sem_prop_t));

    /* Check Parameters */
    return_code = OS_ObjectIdGetById(OS_LOCK_MODE_GLOBAL, LOCAL_OBJID_TYPE, sem_id, &token);
    os_binsem_log("OS_ObjectIdGetById returned %ld for sem_id=%" PRIuPTR ", token=%" PRIuPTR,
                  (long)return_code, (uintptr_t)sem_id, (uintptr_t)&token);

    if (return_code == OS_SUCCESS)
    {
        record = OS_OBJECT_TABLE_GET(OS_global_bin_sem_table, token);

        /* Log record information that is about to be copied */
        if (record != NULL)
        {
            /* record->name_entry is expected to be a NUL-terminated string */
            os_binsem_log("record=%" PRIuPTR " name_entry='%s' creator=%lu",
                          (uintptr_t)record,
                          (record->name_entry != NULL) ? record->name_entry : "(null)",
                          (unsigned long)record->creator);
        }
        else
        {
            os_binsem_log("record is NULL for token=%" PRIuPTR, (uintptr_t)&token);
        }

        strncpy(bin_prop->name, record->name_entry, sizeof(bin_prop->name) - 1);
        bin_prop->creator = record->creator;

        /* Log the state copied into bin_prop before calling the Impl function */
        os_binsem_log("Prepared bin_prop before Impl: name='%s' creator=%lu bin_prop_addr=%" PRIuPTR,
                      bin_prop->name, (unsigned long)bin_prop->creator, (uintptr_t)bin_prop);

        return_code       = OS_BinSemGetInfo_Impl(&token, bin_prop);

        os_binsem_log("OS_BinSemGetInfo_Impl returned %ld for token=%" PRIuPTR " bin_prop=%" PRIuPTR,
                      (long)return_code, (uintptr_t)&token, (uintptr_t)bin_prop);

        OS_ObjectIdRelease(&token);
        os_binsem_log("Released token=%" PRIuPTR, (uintptr_t)&token);
    }
    else
    {
        os_binsem_log("OS_BinSemGetInfo: ObjectIdGetById failed with %ld for sem_id=%" PRIuPTR,
                      (long)return_code, (uintptr_t)sem_id);
    }

    os_binsem_log("EXIT OS_BinSemGetInfo: return_code=%ld for sem_id=%" PRIuPTR,
                  (long)return_code, (uintptr_t)sem_id);

    return return_code;
}

```

<instruction>
Please fix the code so that it compiles successfully.
</instruction>
explanation: Added the necessary standard headers: <stdio.h>, <stdarg.h>, <time.h>, <string.h>, <inttypes.h>, and <stdint.h>. These provide definitions for FILE, va_list, struct tm, strftime/localtime_r, memset/strncpy, and the PRIuPTR macro/uintptr_t type. No logic in OS_BinSemGetInfo was changed; only missing includes were added to resolve the compilation errors.
